remarks: Lemma for ~ fta .  Shift the minimum away from zero by a change of variables.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2014.)
statement:
ftalem.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
ftalem.2 $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
ftalem.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
ftalem.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
ftalem7.5 $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
ftalem7.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` X ) =/= 0 ) $.
ftalem7 $p |- ( ph -> -. A. x e. CC ( abs ` ( F ` X ) ) <_ ( abs ` ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d N x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
